name: Kelvin Long
title: Backend Software Engineer
subtitle: C# .NET Developer | Desktop & Web Applications
summary: Experienced C# .NET developer with a focus on Desktop and Web applications. Passionate about building scalable systems and exploring the intersection of technology and music programming.

about.intro: I'm a software engineer with strong skills in C# and the .NET Framework. I mainly focus on backend development and Azure cloud services. I've worked on many projects, good in system design, migrating old legacy projects, and having a good understanding of software development principles.
focus: 3+ years of experience with C# .NET Framework
2+ years of experience with ASP.NET/ASP.NET Core
2+ years of experience with Microsoft SQL Server/PostgreSQL
1 year of experience with Azure application services
Expertise in WPF, WinUI, WinForm desktop applications
Good experience with Agile/SCRUM and CI/CD (Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions)
about.interests: I also have a big interest in music programming and have contributed to some open-source projects in this area. I love programming and I'm always eager to learn new things.
